text: Villette was a municipality in the district Lavaux-Oron in the canton of Vaud in Switzerland. On 1 July 2011, the municipalities of Cully, Epesses, Grandvaux, Riex and Villette (Lavaux) joined together to become the new municipality of Bourg-en-Lavaux.Amtliches Gemeindeverzeichnis der Schweiz published by the Swiss Federal Statistical Office accessed 17 February 2011 == References == ==Other websites== Category:2011 disestablishments in Switzerland Category:Former municipalities of Vaud
title: Villette, Vaud
